statements: DELETE FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND payment_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supplier_payment_histories WHERE is_late_payment = true AND late_payment_flag_reason IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM supplier_payments WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company' AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM late_payments WHERE late_reason = 'Forgot to send invoice';
DELETE FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_amount > 500.00 AND late_payment = TRUE;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01' AND payment_amount < 100.00;
DELETE FROM late_payments WHERE payment_id IN (SELECT payment_id FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01')
